text: Ijazul Ahsan (born 5 August 1960) has been a Justice of the Supreme Court of Pakistan since 28 June 2016.http://www.supremecourt.gov.pk/web/page.asp?id=2220 Earlier to this he was Chief Justice Lahore High Court, Lahore. He was elevated to the Lahore High Court as a judge in 2009 after the lawyer's movement. He remained associate as a Partner in oldest Law Firm of Pakistan Cornelius, Lane & Mufti (CLM). ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Justices of the Supreme Court of Pakistan Category:Pakistani judges Category:Cornell University alumni Category:Chief Justices of the Lahore High Court Category:Forman Christian College alumni Category:Punjab University Law College alumni
title: Ijazul Ahsan
